articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Different Fields in Wonsan City
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Different Fields in Wonsan City
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to different fields in Wonsan City.
					 He first went round the statue of President Kim Il Sung standing at Haean Square before visiting the Museum of President Kim Il Sung's Revolutionary Activities in Kangwon Province. 
					
					 Looking round the materials on those revolutionary activities with deep emotion, he said that the land of Kangwon Province has turned into a land of bliss for people under the wise leadership of the President and his meticulous care, underscoring the need to repay the great benevolence of the President with loyalty. 
					
					 Noting that the museum is one of the important centers for education to arm party members and other working people, servicepersons and school youth and children with the revolutionary idea of the WPK, he indicated tasks to be fulfilled to manage and operate the museum and strengthen the education through it and ways to do so. 
					
					 Then he gave field guidance to the city management of Wonsan and the Songdowon Open-Air Theatre while making the round of Wonsan City.
					
					 He expressed satisfaction over the fact that the city has energetically pushed forward the construction under a long-term plan and improved its management, making its streets look beautiful to meet the needs of socialism. 
					
					 It is necessary to pay special attention to the management of Wonsan City as it is the city both Koreans and foreigners like to visit, he said, stressing the need to manage all buildings and streets as required by people's culture and emotion and their beautiful manners and customs so that it may take on more perfect looks as a modern port city. 
					
					He looked round the Songdowon Open-Air Theatre on the seaside to acquaint himself with its use. 
					
					 He underscored the need to spruce up the theatre as a modern one as it is associated with the revolutionary activities of the President and conduct brisk diverse political and cultural activities there for the purpose of turning it into a place for educating youngsters and working people. 
					
					 In the evening he commanded a bird's-eye view of Wonsan City bright with peculiar light decorations.
					
					 Watching the attractive appearance of the brightly lit city for a long while, he expressed great satisfaction with the successful completion of light decorations. 
					
					 Saying how nice it is to see the electrification realized in Wonsan City by use of electricity produced by the power station built by the city on its own, he wished its citizens, pace-setters in self-reliance, a happy life as they enjoy pleasure through hard work. 
					
					 Noting that it is necessary to further develop forms and methods of the light decoration as required by the developing reality to provide people with best conditions for a cultural and emotional life, he specified ways to do so. 
					
					  He highly praised the working people in Wonsan for their feats, saying that they achieved shining successes in all aspects in recent years, thus powerfully demonstrating the great mental power of the indomitable Korean people.
					
					  He expressed expectation and conviction that they would continue to play a vanguard role in the great drive for building a great prosperous powerful nation with the same vim and vigor. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Ri Chol Bong, chief secretary of the Kangwon Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and Jang Song Thaek and Choe Ik Gyu, department directors of the C.C., the WPK, and Ri Je Gang and Ri Jae Il, first vice department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: DPRK, Russia Cooperate in Forestry
articles.content:
DPRK, Russia Cooperate in Forestry
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- A protocol of the 13th meeting of the forestry subcommittee of the DPRK-Russia intergovernmental committee for cooperation in trade, economy and science and technology was signed in Pyongyang on Monday.
					Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were Ji Kwang Hae, vice-minister of Forestry, and officials concerned and from the Russian side were members of the Russian forestry delegation led by Ivan Matsorov, vice-minister of Industry and Commerce, and Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					The protocol was inked by Ji Kwang Hae and Ivan Matsorov.

articles.title: Researches to Create Evodia Daniellii Benn Forests
articles.content:
Researches to Create Evodia Daniellii Benn Forests
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The Institute of Forests of Economic Value under the Branch Academy of Forestry is now engaged in energetic researches for the creation of forests of highly productive evodia daniellii benn.
					By deepening researches to adopt high yielding species, the scientists of the institute have completed new technology including methods of fast treatment of seeds and opened a prospect for raising the yield more than 50 percent.
					
					They have also completed a new method of branch grafting to improve the existing evodia daniellii benn into a high-yielding variety.
					
					Scientists are going out to local areas to prepare for introducing high-yielding grafted branches in hundreds of hectares of woodland.

articles.title: Songun Idea to Defend Independence of Country and Nation
articles.content:
Songun Idea to Defend Independence of Country and Nation
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The Songun idea is an idea of independence against imperialism which can reliably defend and guarantee the independence of a country and a nation by dint of an invincible military power.
					The greatest obstacle in the way of achieving the independence of the popular masses is the imperialist forces suppressing, obstructing and going against it.
					
					It is nothing but a daydream to achieve the aspiration of the people after independence, leaving the maneuvers of the imperialists intact.
					
					The main means on which the imperialists rely in violating and repressing the independence of the popular masses is their counter-revolutionary violence, the armed forces.
					
					The more the people's aspiration after independence grows and the deeper the imperialists are driven into dilemma, the tighter the imperialists cling to bayonets.
					
					The history of struggle of the popular masses for realizing independence is a continuation of the bloody struggle against the rulers and oppressors armed to the teeth.
					
					It is the philosophical principle of social development taught by the protracted human history that it is impossible to materialize the people's aspiration after independence without a powerful force of arms with which they can stand against the counter-revolutionary armed forces.
					
					The high-handedness and tyranny of the United States which is styling itself the only "superpower" in the world today are further intensified than ever before in reliance on its military forces, by which the independence cause of the popular masses is confronted with a grave challenge.
					
					The prevailing situation and conditions of the present era demand that importance and primary efforts should be given to military affairs in the revolution and construction to build up invincible military forces.
					
					To prepare an invincible military strength under the banner of Songun is the only way to emerge victorious in the confrontation with the U.S.-led imperialists and to thoroughly realize the independence of a country and a nation.
					
					The Songun idea is the revolutionary one indicating a scientific way of enabling the people to concentrate efforts on military affairs and to increase the revolutionary armed forces in accordance with such practical requirements of the present era and the revolutionary development and to victoriously forge ahead with the struggle of the popular masses for independence in the fierce confrontation with the imperialists.

articles.title: Intensified Anti-imperialist Struggle Called for
articles.content:
Intensified Anti-imperialist Struggle Called for
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The cause of global independence is the just cause of whole mankind. Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 If the peoples of all the countries in the world are to successfully realize global independence while protecting their independence and achieving prosperity and development, they are required to support and encourage and closely cooperate with one another.
					
					 The world progressives should unite to foil the imperialists' moves for domination and defend the sovereignty of their own countries and nations. 
					
					 The imperialists are the common enemy of the world progressives. They are mulling infringing upon the sovereignty of not a few countries but of all the countries of the world and colonizing them. The imperialists will not be able to go reckless if the peoples of all the countries in the world turn out in the struggle to disclose such moves and reject them.
					
					 It is necessary to favor and support those countries solving all the problems arising in building a new society and carving out a new life according to their own decisions to suit their specific conditions. 
					
					 The progressive countries should boost cooperation among themselves to foil the imperialists' moves for neo-colonization and realize global independence.
					
					 It is an important way of destroying the old and unequal international economic order established by the imperialists and building a new and fair one to boost South-South cooperation as required by the development of the times. 
					
					 What is important for the world progressives to support and closely cooperate among them is to hold fast to the principle of respecting sovereignty and the principle of equality, mutual benefit and impartiality. 
					
					 They should not allow themselves to play into the hands of the imperialists justifying their interference in internal affairs of other countries and their high-handed practices under the pretext of "protecting human rights" and "combating terrorism" and trying to make them part of the international order. Absolutely unpardonable is the action of imperialists to punish state leaders legitimately elected according to the unanimous will of peoples by referring them to such mechanisms as the international criminal court. 
					
					 The people of the DPRK will as ever fully support the struggle of the peoples of all the countries in the world desirous of independence and continue to boost cooperation with them.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities Accused of Disallowing Exchange for Reunification
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities Accused of Disallowing Exchange for Reunification
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Co-representatives of the Women Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementation of the June 15 Joint Declaration on April 21 made public a statement titled "We warn Ministry of Unification for the action taken to disallow meeting of women representatives in south and north".
					 The statement accused the ministry of taking an action to disallow representatives of women organizations to visit the north to attend the meeting of women representatives in the south and the north under the pretext of "taking the present inter-Korean relations and their personal safety into consideration."
					
					 The authorities revealed once again their will to stand in the way of reunification by blocking even non-governmental organizations' exchange for reunification, the statement charged, and continued:
					
					 The inter-Korean relations have reached the worst phase because the Lee Myung Bak "government" has pursued the policy of confrontation with the DPRK and insisted on its full participation in the PSI, etc.
					
					 Activities of non-governmental organizations for exchange for reunification will be suppressed in the future, too, unless the authorities drop their policy of confrontation, it noted, adding that the said organization would conduct a positive struggle to achieve the reunification of Korea and ensure its peace in solidarity with the women in the north and overseas.

articles.title: Meeting Held to Extend Thanks to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Meeting Held to Extend Thanks to Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- A meeting of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan was held at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on April 25 to extend thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il for sending educational aid fund and stipends for the democratic national education of the children of the Korean residents in Japan.
					 Attending the meeting were Ri Ki Sok, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee and director general of the General Affairs Department of Chongryon, Ryang Ok Chul, director of the Education Department of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, leading officials of central organizations and enterprises, Chongryon officials in Kanto, officials in the field of education, scientists, Korean students studying at Japanese schools and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Ku Tae Sok, chairman of the Central Standing Council of the Korean Education Association in Japan, in a report said that Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan feel deeply thankful to Kim Jong Il for sending a huge amount of educational aid fund and stipends on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il have sent a huge amount of educational aid fund and stipends for the children of the Korean residents in Japan and the development of democratic national education for more than half a century, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The young Koreans, who have grown under the profound loving care of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, have firmly protected the Chongryon organization and the Korean community from the vicious moves of the reactionaries inside and outside Japan against the DPRK and Chongryon and worked hard for the development of the patriotic movement and the reunification and prosperity of the homeland. This is a noble fruition of the national education and great pride.
					
					 He called on all Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan to make a tangible contribution to the nation-wide cause of achieving the prosperity and reunification of Korea, breathing the same breath with the people in the homeland.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed in Different Countries
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Meetings commemorating the Day of the Sun took place in Bangladesh, India and Austria from Apr. 9 to 14.
					 On display in the venues of the meetings were works of the peerless great men, photos showing their immortal exploits and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 Speakers including the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist-Leninist) who is minister of Industries of Bangladesh, the chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh and the president of the Bangladesh People's League highly praised President Kim Il Sung as the father of socialist Korea who dedicated himself to the reunification of the country and the happiness of the people all his life and a peerless political elder who defeated two imperialisms, the U.S. and Japanese, built socialism centered on the popular masses and made an undying contribution to the human cause of independence.
					
					Referring to the fact that the revolutionary cause of Juche started by the President has been successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, they stressed the DPRK has turned into a political, ideological and military power under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The secretary general of the Indian Society for Juche Idea-Self-Reliance Studies praised
						Kim Il Sung as founder of the DPRK and great leader who built a socialist power in Korea.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the DPRK would surely turn into a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and the cause of national reunification would be accomplished without fail in the near future under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The chairman of the Advisory Committee of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK said that the DPRK has made a great advance in its struggle for the happiness of the people under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, a creditable successor to the cause of
						Kim Il Sung, expressing the hope that the Korean people would register successes in their efforts to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 Messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings held in India and Austria.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Venezuela
 Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" was brought out in pamphlet by the Canta Clara Publishing House of Venezuela on Apr. 15.
					 The work, published on Mar. 1, Juche 82 (1993), lays bare the reactionary nature and absurdity of the sophistry let loose by the imperialists and renegades of socialism terming socialism "totalitarian", "barracks-like" and "administrative and commanding."
					
					 It clarifies the principled issues arising in defending the cause of socialism and accomplishing it including the issue of making socialism faith and morality and the issue of giving full play to the advantages of socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il felicita a los oficiales y soldados de Unidad No. 851 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il felicita a los oficiales y soldados de Unidad No. 851 del EPC
Pyongyang, 27 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea visito el dia 25 la comandancia de la Unidad No. 851 del EPC para felicitar a los oficiales y  soldados del EPC con motivo del 77o aniversario de su fundacion.
					  El Comandante Supremo fue acogido sobre el terreno por los comandantes de la Unidad.
					
					  Respondiendo a las aclamaciones entusiastas de los militares, el Dirigente felicito a los oficiales y soldados del EPC que celebran el 77o aniversario de la fundacion.
					
					  Senalo que los militares manifiestan tambien hoy el poderio majestuoso de la unidad en la lucha sagrada por la defensa de la patria continuando la orgullosa tradicion de la unidad y recordo con gran emocion la gloriosa trayectoria recorrida por esta.
					
					  Enseno que en el estandarte de la unidad llena de la victoria y la gloria, esta conservado el alma preciosa de los martires revolucionarios quienes lucharon dedicando la juventud y la vida por el partido y el lider, la patria y el pueblo y evaluo altamente las proezas heroicas de ellos quienes dejaron huellas brillantes en la historia de la gran guerra de la patria.
					
					  Hizo conocimientos del estado del cumplimiento del deber y ejercicis de la unidad y se entero de los detalles de la labor y la vida de los militares.
					
					  Se mostro muy satisfecho de que todos los oficiales y soldados de la unidad crecieron como combatientes capaces de pelear uno contra cien enemigos, dispuestos de la elevada capacidad de combate y la tecnica de combate al fortalecer los ejercicios y cumplen con responsabilidad la guardia avanzada manteniendo la aguda vigilancia sobre las maniobras agresivas de los enemigos.
					
					  Y presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia para fortalecer al EPC como las invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					  Acto seguido, el Comandante Supremo se fotografio junto con los militares de la Unidad.
					
					  Le acompanaron el submariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, los generales de ejercito del EPC Kim Myong Guk, Kim Won Hong, Hyon Chol Hae, Ri Myong Su y otros miembros directivos del ejercito.
					
					  Ademas, participaron en la ocasion el secretario del CC del PTC Kim Ki Nam, el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC Jang Song Thaek, los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC Ju Kyu Chang, Ri Je Gang y Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito
Pyongyang, 27 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio el dia 25 la funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito dedicada al 77o aniversario de la fundacion del EPC.
					  En el repertorio se incluyeron el coro masculino "Al mariscal Kim Il Sung" y "Marcha del Ejercito Popular de Corea", el solo y coro masculinos "?Donde esta querido General?", el solo femenino y coro masculino "Nadie lo sabe", el solo y coro masculinos "Por la unica patria", la musica orquestal y coro masculino "Paso de montana Mungyong", el coro masculino "Defenderemos a muerte la Direccion de la Revolucion" y otras piezas.
					
					  A traves del espectaculo, los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico la gloriosa trayectoria del EPC, que recorrio siempre la senda de victorias y glorias, y mostraron patentemente la ferrea conviccion y la indoblegable voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea de llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en la selva del monte Paektu.
					
					  Muy satisfecho de que los artistas del Coro ofrecieron esta magnifica funcion en que palpitan el espiritu de la epoca y el revolucionario de los militares, el Comandante Supremo aprecio mucho los exitos logrados por ellos en la ocasion.
					
					  Expreso su esperanza y conviccion de que todos los creadores y artistas del Coro Estatal Benemerito libraran dinamicamente las actividades artisticas revolucionarias y combativas para llamar energicamente a nuestro ejercito y pueblo a la gran batalla para construir una gran potencia prospera.
					
					  El Comandante Supremo fue acompanado en esta ocasion por el ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, el primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, los generales de ejercito del EPC, Kim Myong Guk, Hyon Chol Hae, Ri Myong Su y Kim Won Hong, y otros miembros directivos del ejercito, el secretario del CC del PTC Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, Pak Nam Gi, Choe Ik Gyu y Kim Yang Gon, y otros cuadros del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige la Universidad de Agricultura de Wonsan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige la Universidad de Agricultura de Wonsan
Pyongyang, 27 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el invernadero libre de contaminacion del tipo de suelo, construido nuevamente en la Universidad de Agricultura de Wonsan.
					  Este invernaculo ultramoderno, en que se realizan automaticamente todas las labores de operacion incluyendo el control de luz, temperatura y humedad, es un regalo del Dirigente a los profesores, los empleados y los estudiantes de ese plantel docente.
					
					  Al recorrer el exterior y el interior del invernaculo, el Dirigente averiguo en detalles del estado de construccion y uso.
					
					  Evaluo altamente los meritos de los constructores militares mostrandose muy satisfecho de que ellos terminaron en un corto plazo la obra de este moderno invernadero altamente automatizado.
					
					  Resaltando la necesidad de dinamizar en este invernadero las labores de cultivo e investigacion de las plantas agricolas, indico las tareas y remedios para este fin.
					
					  Acto seguido, se cercioro en detalles del estado de repoblacion forestal paseando por el recinto de la universidad donde los arboles se tornan cada dia mas verdes.
					
					  El aspecto orgulloso de la universidad, que creo el magnifico ejemplo en la reforestacion, es el fruto del noble patriotismo manifestado plenamente durante largo tiempo por los profesores, los empleados y los estudiantes, destaco y anadio que otras universidades y unidades deben seguir el ejemplo de ellos.
					
					  Recalco que la Universidad de Agricultura de Wonsan desempena un papel importante en el desarrollo agricola del pais y presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la pedagogia, la educacion y la investigacion cientifica.
					
					  Esta universidad libro una dinamica lucha por materializar la Tesis sobre la Educacion Socialista presentada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, de modo que se estableciera firmemente el caracter del Juche en la educacion, se mejorara la calidad de ensenanza y se sentara la solida base material y tecnica, apunto y prosiguio que tales exitos orgullosos alcanzados en la educacion son el producto de los esfuerzos realizados en silencio por los educadores que dedicaron todo lo suyo a la ensenanza de las generacion venideras.
					
					  Destacando que la universidad tiene la importante tarea de situar en un nivel mas alto la pedagogia y la formacion de los agronomos y otros especialistas en la agricultura conforme a la nueva demanda de la revolucion coreana, dijo que ella debe formar a los universitarios para que ellos contribuyan mejor al desarrollo cientifico-tecnico del pais y a la construccion de la economia socialista.
					
					  Para producir un nuevo viraje en la formacion del personal tecnico de la rama, es preciso acondicionar bien el invernadero y otras bases de estudios cientificos, impulsar la investigacion con vistas al futuro y prestar profunda atencion a la labor y la vida de los profesores, empleados y estudiantes, asevero.
					
					  Le acompanaron el secretario del CC del PTC Kim Ki Nam y los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek y Pak Nam Gi.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige labores de varios sectores de Wonsan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige labores de varios sectores de Wonsan
Pyongyang, 27 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio en el terreno las labores de varios sectores de la ciudad de Wonsan.
					  Ante todo, el Dirigente estuvo ante la estatua de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung, levantada en la Plaza Haean, y recorrio el Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria del Camarada Kim Il Sung de la Provincia de Kangwon.
					
					    Al pasar revista con profunda emocion a los materiales exhibidos, dijo que se debe responder con lealtad a las inmensas benevolencias del Presidente subrayando que gracias a la sabia direccion y esmerada atencion de el, la provincia de Kangwon se ha convertido en un paraiso del pueblo.
					
					  Senalando que el museo es una de las importantes bases de educacion para armar a los militantes del partido, trabajadores, militares, jovenes y ninos con la idea revolucionaria del partido, indico las tareas y remedios para mejorar la administracion del museo e intensificar la educacion a traves de el.
					
					  Acto seguido, realizo un recorrido por la ciudad de Wonsan dirigiendo la urbanizacion y el Anfiteatro de Songdowon.
					
					  Se mostro muy contento de que esa ciudad hermoseo sus calles a la manera socialista al impulsar activamente la construccion y mejorar la urbanizacion segun el plan prospectivo de urbanismo.
					
					　Puesto que la ciudad de Wonsan es un lugar preferido de los habitantes coreanos y los extranjeros, es preciso prestar especial atencion a la administracion urbana, recalco.
					
					　Prosiguio que se debe acondicionar mejor esta ciudad como la portuaria civilizada al administrar todos los edificios y calles conforme a la demanda cultural y las bellas costumbres de nuestro pueblo.
					
					   Acto seguido, recorrio el Anfiteatro de Songdowon situado a la orilla del mar enterandose del estado de su uso.
					
					  Resalto la importancia de modernizar ese teatro, en que estan reflejadas las huellas de la direccion revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung, y desarrollar aqui ampliamente diversas actividades politico-culturales, de modo que se convierta en una base de educacion para los jovenes, ninos escolares y trabajadores.
					
					  Por la noche de ese dia, el Dirigente presencio el panorama nocturno de la ciudad de Wonsan adornada con lamparillas de modo fascinante y original.
					
					  Al contemplar por largo tiempo el aspecto agradable de la ciudad bien iluminada, el Dirigente se puso muy contento por la magnifica decoracion con lamparillas.
					
					  !Que buena es esta electrificacion con la energia electrica producida en la central electrica construida por cuenta propia en la ciudad de Wonsan!, dijo y bendijo la vida feliz de los ciudadanos, precursores de la autoconfianza que disfrutan la felicidad al cabo de superar las duras pruebas.
					
					  Subrayo que al desarrollar mas las formas y metodos del adorno con aparatos electricos conforme a la demanda de la realidad en desarrollo, se debe dar optimas condiciones de vida cultural a nuestro pueblo, y enseno pormenorizadamente los remedios para el respecto.
					
					  Aprecio mucho los meritos de los trabajadores de Wonsan destacando que ellos alcanzaron en los ultimos anos brillantes exitos en todos los aspectos y manifestaron asi patentemente la gran potencia espiritual del pueblo coreano que nunca se pone de rodillas ante las dificultades.
					
					　Por ultimo, expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos seguiran cumpliendo el papel de vanguardia en la magna obra de construccion de una gran potencia prospera con el mismo impetu y el mismo brio.
					
					  Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del comite del PTC en la provincia de Kangwon, Ri Chol Bong, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek y Choe Ik Gyu, los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Je Gang y Ri Jae Il.
